ygData.subject: Into the Fire

Subject: Into the Fire
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

From: KSLawdogg@...

Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector:



Shockwave armed his missile launchers getting a target lock.  "ALL HAIL THE 
NEO DECEPTICON EMPIRE AND PREPARE TO FEEL THE WRATH OF THE EMPEROR!  EMPEROR 
SHOCKWAVE!" he intoned loudly enough for many on the battle to hear.

The NDE Emperor launched two energy-signature seeking missiles at Scavenger

---

Unitron hovered momentarily in his space fighter mode, knowing exactly who 
would die.  Getting a lock, he launched off two energy-signature seeking 
missiles at Zardus.

---

Firestarter flew low in a strafing run, twenty rapid laser blasts lancing out 
at the Cybertronian Fire.

---

Double Punch approached the base in his stealth mode, cloaked from sensors 
and view.  He raised his left pincher, firing off two energy-signature 
seeking missiles at Prowl, the right pincher raising to launch two missiles 
at the Cybertronian Fire.  While doing this, he launched his cyber-bee, 
Beeline, and ran hard left so he wasn't in the same place.

---

Manterror took flight, gaining altitude rapidly.  "It's payback, traitors!" 
he screamed, firing down four ion disks (two from each arm).  Two at Dark 
One, the two others at the Cybertronian Fire.

---

Injector raised gradually into the air, raising both stinger missile 
launchers.  From the left one he fired two missiles at Blades, and from the 
right one he fired two missiles at Breakdown's back.

---

Vehement hovered, looking at the battle.  "Brotherhood, I detect incoming 
forces.  Arm your weapons, and until these new enemies arrive, lay waste to 
the bases in the name of Unicron!" he yelled, raising his right fist which 
transformed into the shape of a cannon, firing two missiles off at the 
Cybertronian Fire.

---

Sun Crusher's right wrist raised, a cannon attached to it pointed at the CF.  
Two fusion blasts erupted from the depths of the weapon heading for the enemy 
base.

---

Reflector raised his left wrist, the twin-mounted barrel on it launching off 
four missiles (two from each barrel) at the Cybertronian Fire.  "Prepare for 
death, heathens."
